product_name: Black Diamond RockLock Screwgate Carabiner - Blemished
long_description: As the largest locking belay and rappel 'biner from Black Diamond, the RockLock Screwgate Carabiner is designed with a keylock nose that won't snag on bolts or gear when you're clipping. Large 'biner is an excellent choice when using gloves, 2 ropes or a variety of techniques in rappelling and belaying. Gate opening is maximized by incorporating a slightly curved spine. Belay loop is held securely in place when 'biner is opened by the square hinge end. Screwgate can be operated with 1 hand. Munter hitch compatible. Blemished; item has minor cosmetic blemishes that do not affect product performance.
short_description: As the largest locking belay and rappel 'biner from Black Diamond, the RockLock Screwgate Carabiner is designed with a keylock nose that won't snag on bolts or gear when you're clipping.
